body.name: Jucoan 4 Pack Dustpan and Brush Set, Small Portable Dustpan with Brush for Cleaning Home Office School Classroom Desk Table Countertop Sofa Bed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 25 mins
features: The cleaning kit includes 4 brushes and 4 dustpans in 2 colors, blue and beige, each color 2 pack.
This small dustpan and brush set is made of high quality plastic, very sturdy and durable.

The small hand broom brush is made with the long and soft broom fibers that can capture and move dirt effectively. it can get into small cracks and cervices. The dustpan features Soft rubber edge for helping you sweep up any debris with ease, and ensures you catch it all.
The brush handle snaps into the handle of the pan and locks in place for compact and easy storage. And the handle has a hook for easy for hanging.

The hand broom and dustpan set size is 7” W x 10” L, small and lightweight, suitable for cleaning table, desk, keyboard, cars, cabinets, closets, sofa, your pet's mess, and other areas in your home, office and school.

The dustpan features Soft rubber edge for helping you sweep up any debris with ease, and ensures you catch it all.

Great for cleaning table, desk, keyboard, cars, cabinets, closets, sofa, pet's mess, and other areas in your home, office and school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what we needed for our cat adoption center when cleaning cages. Small but makes cleaning up, especially litter so much easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not as flimsy as I thought they'd be, but the brush has this weird static cling and fling to it that makes it hard to sweep anything. You sweep litter towards the scoop, and it goes everywhere but in the scoop. Strange magic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little broom & dust pan sets!!
reviews.reviewText: We have two covered litter boxes, in two different areas of our home, and I have a set of these sitting on top of each one.They’re just the right size, colors are nice & neutral and the little broom handle slides nicely into the handle of the dustpan.And these little dustpans meet the floor perfectly. They’re actually better than my normal size dustpan!!I did notice some stray bristles when I first opened them, so I stood over the trash can and just fanned them out, it wasn’t many at all. And that was it they haven’t shed a bristle since, and they’re used multiple times a day. They’re really full bodied without the big gaps in between like most small whisk broom sets that I’ve used in the past.Great little sets at a really good price, for lots of uses around the house, and I’m going to stick a set under my car seat as well. I’m very pleased with my purchase & big Kudos to the company & seller!! Thank you!!😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good size for littles. My 4 year olds in my daycare xan slide the handles in and hang well. My 2 year olds are getting there. Work okay. Not great with sand and okay with playdough. Bristles could be firmer to help push those heavy playdough clumps and kinetic sand, etc that the kids are to "help." Okay for 4 pack price. Dog chewed one of the handles day one. Thin plastic easily cracked if you not careful. The pan part works really well actualy and I can scoop playsand off my yard pavers without the sweep almost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read lots of reviews before I landed on this little 4-pack. Everything about this set is perfect. The bristles are just flexible enough to pick up spilled flour and sturdy enough to be used in my potting area for spilled potting soil. I even used the outdoor one to pick up gravel once.The rubber lip on the dustpan helps to catch everything in the first swipe. There are even little teeth sculpted into one shoulder of the dustpan to help scrape sticky soil from the brush right into the pan. The brush itself is at the perfect angle for sweeping up small spills.Somebody really thought this one through!And, my goodness, the price is certainly right!I want to add that I really appreciate the reviewers who came before me to help find the perfect little "butler's helper."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I run an animal shelter and these are perfect for cleaning out the cat cages. They see a lot of wear so I'd just been buying them from the dollar store. I decided to step up and as these came us in a group of four it seemed appropriate. They are much better made than the dollar store ones I bought and I know they will last longer. I will keep buying these as needed.
